column4:
·Single Chip a-Si LCD Driver
·Support max. resolution 720RGB x 2160
·I/F: MIPI-DSI 4 Lanes, max. bandwidth 1.3Gbps
·RAMLESS & Support GOA/GIP control signal
·Support Full Color (16.7M)
·Built-in analog & digital RGB 3 gamma
·Built-in Xm-Plus Image Algorithm
·Built-in one timing program
·Support inversion type: Dot/Column/Zig-Zag
·Support 3 power mode
·Build-in OTP Power generator
